summary: Adds about 97 mods to your game that all work in harmony to make the game better.
descriptionHtml:
Hey, thanks for clicking by!

This is a mod pack which consists of about 80+ mods. there are different sections to the modpack

[list=1]
[*]Core
[*]Supplemental

[*]Expansions
[*]Padding Layer 1
[*]Padding Layer 2

[*]Padding Layer 3

[*]Padding Layer 4

[*]Padding Layer 5

[*]Perks
[*]Camera
[/list]
[spoiler] test [/spoiler]
author: Dragor
